title:
Why is there nothing on this site today, 9/25/11, in top or national news, about Hermain Cain winning the FL staw poll with 37% of the vote?  Is it because it doesn\'t fit the liberal template?  After all, the top candidate for the Tea Party, including me and almost everyone I know, is a self-made conservative black man!  



So where\'s the coverage?  Hmmm?
text:
I just saw your question today, Monday, Sept. 26.



Here's a link to the updated story posted today:
